abstract: The Day: Political ploys in Russia could almost serve as an instruction manual for the leadership at either end of New York's City Hall. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: Political ploys in Russia could almost serve as an instruction manual for the leadership at either end of New York's City Hall. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
lead_paragraph: Political ploys under way in Russia could almost serve as an instruction manual for the leadership at either end of New York's City Hall. You have to slap your forehead in wonder that the New Yorkers didn't think up comparable high jinks for themselves.
